name: withParentSpan
signature: { (span: AnySpan): <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, Exclude<R, ParentSpan>>; <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>, span: AnySpan): Effect<A, E, Exclude<R, ParentSpan>>; }
